item.title: New Silverlight sword
item.dc:creator: @johnw1 johnw1
item.description:
@johnw1 wrote:

Here are runescapes new silverlight models.
I only take credit for downloading + resizing/rotating the drop model.

Add this to your class8.java for new rotations.

if(i == 2402){ class8.anInt181 = 1250; class8.anInt190 = 488; class8.anInt198 = 0; class8.anInt204 = 0; class8.anInt169 = -1; class8.anInt194 = 0; class8.anInt188 = -1; class8.anInt164 = -1; class8.anInt175 = -1; class8.anInt197 = -1; }

Then download either the preloading models or “add model” .gz ones and add them to your client.

“.dat” for preloading:
http://www.fileden.com/files/2008/11/21/2195413/silverlightpreloading.rar

“.gz” for “add model”:
http://www.fileden.com/files/2008/11/21/2195413/silverlightgz.rar

Screenshot of what it will look like:

Read full topic
